=================
Displayed fields 
=================

When we open the "Contacts" journal in the browser the fields in the table and 
in the edit form are displayed in the order in which they were created. 

To change how fields are displayed in the table, click the **View** 
button to open the
:doc:`View Fields Dialog </admin/items/view_fields_dialog>`. 

.. image:: /intro/_images/view_contacts1.png
	:align: center
	:alt: View contacts1

Let's change the displayed fields using the buttons **left**, **right**, **up** 
and **down**

.. image:: /intro/_images/view_contacts2.png
	:align: center
	:alt: View contacts2

To change the way the fields are displayed in the edit form click the **Edit**
button to open the
:doc:`Edit Fields Dialog </admin/items/edit_fields_dialog>`.

.. image:: /intro/_images/edit_contacts2.png
	:align: center
	:alt: Edit contacts2

To see the result of our work, go to the project page and and refresh it.

.. image:: /intro/_images/contacts_view.png
	:align: center
	:alt: Contacts view
